entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
